name: Unidentified_Urchiv-ki_traffic_controller
content:
A member of the Urchiv-ki species who spoke the Taarja language served as a traffic controller of the Urchiv Tower Dimension government and its Urch Planetary and Space Control. Around 19 BBY, the Chiss Ascendancy sent Ambassador Boadil'par'gasoi "Ilparg" on a diplomatic mission to the Tower Dimension's capital planet Urch aboard the Nightdragon man-of-war warship Vigilant. The Urchiv-ki traffic controller communicated in the Taarja language with the Vigilant, sharing that he refused to allow Ilparg's shuttle to visit Urch. The ambassador, furious, told the Vigilant's commander, Admiral Ar'alani, to call the Urchiv-ki back. However, as several starships affiliated with the Nikardun Destiny hegemony encircled the man-of-war, Ar'alani was forced to flee to hyperspace.
The Urchiv-ki appeared in the 2020 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising, written by Timothy Zahn as part of his Star Wars: The Ascendancy Trilogy.
